short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The best way to learn Qualleish

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QualleHobber allows you to learn Qualleish while browsing the web!

When enabled, some words will be replaced with green words, and the green words are in Qualleish, click on it to learn the pronunciation and what it means!

You can change the amount of words you want to learn by clicking on the extension icon and typing the number in the textbox, or disable it by typing 0 and then press Enter.
